content:
Cehpoint Terms of Use for Google Auth Credentials and Google Gemini AI

1. Use of Google Auth Credentials

By authenticating with Google Auth, you authorize Cehpoint to access your Google account details, such as your email address, full name, and unique user ID.

You acknowledge that Cehpoint will store secure authentication tokens for maintaining your session and may use the provided data to enhance your experience with Google Gemini AI.

2. Integration with Google Gemini AI

CePoint's services integrate with Google Gemini AI to provide personalized, AI-driven features and recommendations. The data shared through Google Auth is used solely for the purpose of enabling this functionality.

You acknowledge that Google Gemini AI may analyze certain usage data (such as input queries and timestamps) to provide responses tailored to your needs.

3. Data Privacy and Security

Cehpoint is committed to safeguarding your personal information. We do not share your Google Auth data with third parties unless required by law or as part of the authentication process with Google.

All personal data and authentication tokens are encrypted and stored securely in compliance with industry standards.

4. User Responsibilities

You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your Google Auth credentials. Any misuse of your account resulting from unauthorized access through your credentials will not hold Cehpoint liable.

You agree not to share or distribute Google Auth credentials or allow any unauthorized third party to access your account.

5. Limitations of Liability

Cehpoint is not liable for any loss or damage caused by the use of Google Auth credentials or Google Gemini AI beyond what is allowed by applicable law.

Cehpoint is not responsible for any inaccurate or incomplete data generated by Google Gemini AI as part of your interaction with our services.

6. Termination of Service

Cehpoint reserves the right to terminate your access to services if it is determined that you have violated any terms regarding the use of Google Auth credentials or Google Gemini AI.

You may revoke your Google Auth consent at any time, but this may result in the inability to access some or all Cehpoint features that require Google Gemini AI integration.

7. Amendments to Terms

Cehpoint may update these terms from time to time. Any significant changes will be communicated to you via email or through a notification on our platform.

Continued use of Cehpoint after such changes will constitute acceptance of the revised terms.

8. Contact Information

For any inquiries related to these terms, or if you have concerns about how your Google Auth credentials are being used, please contact us at:

Email: jit@cehpoint.co.in

Address: Labpur, Birbhum 731303, India
